To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private RelativeMovingAverage _rma;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_rma = RMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_rma.IsReady)
{
    var shortAverage = _rma.ShortAverage.Value;
    var mediumAverage = _rma.MediumAverage.Value;
    var longAverage = _rma.LongAverage.Value;
    var current = _rma.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.rma = self.RMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.rma.IsReady:
    short_average = self.rma.ShortAverage.Value
    medium_average = self.rma.MediumAverage.Value
    long_average = self.rma.LongAverage.Value
    current = self.rma.Current.Value
